      public boolean bookRoom(String guestName, int checkIn, int checkOut)
      Books a room and makes a reservation, if possible
      Parameters:
      guestName - the guests name
      checkIn - date of checking in
      checkOut - date of checking out
      Returns:
      {true} if room booking is successful, {false} if room booking is not successful

    • changePrice

      public boolean changePrice(double newPrice)
      changes the price of all rooms in the hotel, if and only if there are no reseravations
      Parameters:
      newPrice - the new price, constraint: newPrice >= 100
      Returns:
      {true} if the basae price is successfully changed, {false} if otherwise
